title: Large 3 bedroom 1 bath
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Three bedroom one bath apartment in lovely Albany Park.
Close to many restaurants, stores and public transportation.
Just rehabbed with new windows, refinished hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances including microwave and dishwasher, new kitchen counter top and cabinets, plus updated bathroom.
3 bedrooms with large closets, separate living room and large dining room.
Unit has central heat and new air conditioning.
